q: Can I use these tools for free?
a: Yes, all offer free tiers with some limits.

q: How do I share my AI app?
a: Deploy and share the public link provided by the platform.

q: Do I need to know Python?
a: No-code tools like Lovable, Bubble, and Glide require no coding. Colab and Spaces support Python for advanced users.

q: Can I deploy to my own domain?
a: Yes, Vercel, Bubble, and Glide support custom domains for deployed apps.

q: How do I get free GPU?
a: Google Colab, Hugging Face Spaces, and Peltarion offer free GPU for eligible projects.

q: What if my app goes to sleep?
a: Upgrade your plan or use keep-alive services to prevent sleep.
